mapper.insert: INSERT INTO KOSMO_BOARD ( KBNUM, KBSUBJECT, KBNAME, KBCONTENT, KBFILE, KBPW, MDELETEYN, MINSERTDATE, MUPDATEDATE) VALUES( #{kbnum}, #{kbsubject}, #{kbname}, #{kbcontent}, #{kbfile}, #{kbpw}, 'Y', SYSDATE, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT A.KBNUM KBNUM ,A.KBSUBJECT KBSUBJECT ,A.KBNAME KBNAME ,A.KBCONTENT KBCONTENT ,A.KBFILE KBFILE ,A.KBPW KBPW ,A.MDELETEYN MDELETEYN ,TO_CHAR(A.MINSERTDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') MINSERTDATE ,TO_CHAR(A.MUPDATEDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') MUPDATEDATE FROM KOSMO_BOARD A WHERE A.MDELETEYN = 'Y' ORDER BY 1 DESC

SELECT A.KBNUM KBNUM ,A.KBSUBJECT KBSUBJECT ,A.KBNAME KBNAME ,A.KBCONTENT KBCONTENT ,A.KBFILE KBFILE ,A.KBPW KBPW ,A.MDELETEYN MDELETEYN ,A.MINSERTDATE MINSERTDATE ,A.MUPDATEDATE MUPDATEDATE FROM KOSMO_BOARD A WHERE A.MDELETEYN = 'Y' AND A.KBNUM = #{kbnum}
